zh.doc.index.387411-0: 中国移动物联卡能力开放平台：
zh.doc.index.387411-2: 平台对接通过API的方式与三方系统进行数据对接，为物联卡的管理提供数据交互支持。
zh.doc.index.387411-4: 第三方应用唯一标识，中国移动物联网全网管理员在 OneLink能力开放平台 上分配并展示给集团客户。
zh.doc.index.387411-5: 获取路径：“中移物联卡能力开放平台”--“个人中心”--“客户信息”--“接入信息”
zh.doc.index.387411-6: API 接入秘钥,由中国移动物联网提供，集团客户从“OneLink能力开放平台”获取。
zh.doc.index.387411-8: token后缀请根据实际情况填写
zh.doc.index.387411-12: 5G连接管理平台用户的唯一标识，用于身份识别。
zh.doc.index.387411-13: 获取路径：“5G连接管理平台”--“能力开放”--“API网关账号管理”
zh.doc.index.387411-15: 用户id经加密之后的密码。
zh.doc.index.387411-19: 获取路径：“雁飞智连CMP平台”--“我的应用”--“应用列表”

en.doc.index.387411-0: China Mobile IoT Card Capability Open Platform:
en.doc.index.387411-2: The platform interfaces with third-party systems through APIs to provide data exchange support for the management of IoT cards.
en.doc.index.387411-4: The unique identifier for third-party applications is assigned and displayed to group customers by China Mobile IoT network administrators on the OneLink capability open platform.
en.doc.index.387411-5: Access path: "China Mobile IoT Card Capability Open Platform" - "Personal Center" - "Customer Information" - "Access Information"
en.doc.index.387411-6: The API access key is provided by China Mobile IoT and obtained by group customers from the "OneLink Capability Open Platform".
en.doc.index.387411-8: Please fill in the token suffix according to the actual situation
en.doc.index.387411-12: The unique identifier for 5G connection management platform users, used for identity recognition.
en.doc.index.387411-13: Access path: "5G Connection Management Platform" - "Capability Openness" - "API Gateway Account Management"
en.doc.index.387411-15: The encrypted password for the user ID.
en.doc.index.387411-19: Get path: "Yanfei Zhilian CMP Platform" - "My Applications" - "Application List"
